graph_title: Rate of children who were the subject of a child protection plan
indicator_name: Proportion of children aged 1–17 years who experienced any physical punishment and/or psychological aggression by caregivers in the past month
target_name: End abuse, exploitation, trafficking and all forms of violence against and torture of children
indicator_available: Rate of children subject to a child protection plan (neglect, physical abuse, sexual abuse, emotional abuse, multiple)
computation_definitions: A Child becomes the subject of a child protection plan if they are assesed as being at risk of harm at an initial child protection conference
other_information: The data are for all children who are on child protection plans at any point during the year. Reference period is from 1 April to 31 March. Population estimates are from the ONS Mid year population estimates
